text:
Hi All,
Just wanted to know if there is any way to make login/signup functionality using HubCms, HubDB, HubL or any other way within HubSpot environment(without using any external database).
Thanks

Hi there for some reason I used to be able to use a command to push from my dev account to prod account for my company using this command: "hs upload blank-lp-te blank-lp-te --account=prod" but somehow now getting error "Error while retrieving new access token: MISSING_USER_PERMISSION."  I have notified the person who is our admin but we are still trying to figure it out.  Let me know if anyone has any ideas on this - thx!
deactivated my personal access key on the site and then made a new one and it fixed it <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/developer-reference/local-development-cli>
